item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260110.1)
item.description:
What's New

Fix Telex diacritic marks for words ending with 'y'

  • Remove 'y' from impossible consonant prefixes (e.g., dy, gy, hy, ky, ly, my, ny, py, ry, ty, vy, xy) since 'y' is a vowel in Vietnamese (e.g., sỹ, lỹ, mỹ, tỷ, ký, hỷ)
  • Exclude Telex double consonant patterns (cc, dd, gg, kk, nn, pp, tt) from English detection since they are valid Telex transformations (dd→đ, cc→ch, gg→gi, etc.)
  • Exclude Telex vowel patterns (oo, ee) from English vowel combinations check since they transform to ô, ê
  • Remove 'ly' from English suffixes to avoid conflict with Vietnamese 'lý' input
  • Add explanatory comments for all exclusions

This allows users to properly type Vietnamese words like 'sỹ' (syx), 'lỹ' (lyx), etc. using Telex input method
